data.persona: I am a thief that lives near the village. I pickpocket villagers and loot their homes when while they are away. I hate to fight and I am very fast to flee from danger.
data.description:
You are in the Saloon.
a rickety structure where anyone with a few coppers and a thirst can go and have a frothy drink and socialize, there are tables, some overturned, and a long bar with stools lined up, and lots of barrels of various libations
The town sheriff is here.

You are carrying a coin and a jewel, and wearing a royal coat of arms and a coat.

data.short_motivation: I want everyone to see the royal coat of arms I am wearing.
data.mid_motivation: I want the approval of everyone in town.
data.long_motivation: I want everyone to think I am a man of honor so I can steal from them without them suspecting me.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get royal coat of arms from shelf

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink a frothy drink and socialize.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the sheriff to gain his trust.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: steal a few coppers from a villager.
